name: Janine
info: Koga’s daughter and a ninja Gym Leader, she uses Poison-type Pokémon out of respect for her father. She also likes to argue like him from time to time.

moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.effect: Critical hits land more easily. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Venom Drench
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed by 1 stat rank when the target is poisoned or badly poisoned. Fails when the target is not poisoned or badly poisoned.

moves.name: Move Like the Wind!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed and evasiveness by 2 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: Ninja Spirit Cross Poison
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
